title: Zoom In Pics guess the picture photo word trivia Download
text: Guess the object from the zoomed in photo as fast as you can...simple!Join more than 1 million Chaos Picture Family Game users in the most addictive and challenging game yet!SIMPLE, FUN AND ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY- 3 different types of games that 3 games in one. - Over 300 different pictures- 1200 different puzzles- Achievement system to keep track of your progress- Earn coins to unlock more categories, get hints and add time- No complicated rules, just start playing and having fun!- A huge selection of levels ranging from easy to fiendishly difficult!- Word Trivia style game play- And much more!This game is ideal for girls, boys, kids, teens and adults of all ages and is available to download for FREE!ABOUT Chaos HappenZSmall indie game company with over 30 year experience creating games from trivia games, to puzzle games, to board games, to RPGs and more. We are growing company and would like to welcome you to our world of Chaos HappenZ. Remember Chaos HappenZ!Visit us: http://www.ChaosHappenZ.comLike us: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Chaos-HappenZ/261826128019?ref=hlFollow us: https://twitter.com/ChaosHappenZPRIMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR PARENTSOur games are free to play but certain in-game items may be purchased for real money. You may restrict in-app purchases by disabling them on your device.PLAY FOR FREE NOW!
